languages.text: "Смилуйтесь, {mf|господин|госпожа}! В такое-то время не ждешь встретить никого, кроме нечестивцев! Низкий поклон, и да благословит вас сияние Трона! Я Вир, презреннейший Вир!"

traits.locale_text: "Смилуйтесь, {mf|господин|госпожа}! В такое-то время не ждешь встретить никого, кроме нечестивцев! Низкий поклон, и да благословит вас сияние Трона! Я Вир, презреннейший Вир!"

languages.text: "Have mercy, {mf|master|mistress}! In these dire times you cannot expect to meet anyone but the apostates! I humbly kneel, and may the radiance of the Throne bless your souls! I am Vir, wretched Vir!"
languages.original_text: "Смилуйтесь, {mf|господин|госпожа}! В такое-то время не ждешь встретить никого, кроме нечестивцев! Низкий поклон, и да благословит вас сияние Трона! Я Вир, презреннейший Вир!"

traits.locale_text: "Have mercy, {mf|master|mistress}! In these dire times you cannot expect to meet anyone but the apostates! I humbly kneel, and may the radiance of the Throne bless your souls! I am Vir, wretched Vir!"

"Have mercy, {mf|master|mistress}! In these dire times you cannot expect to meet anyone but the apostates! I humbly kneel, and may the radiance of the Throne bless your souls! I am Vir, a scout for the Children of Redemption."

"Have mercy, {mf|master|mistress}! In these dire times you cannot expect to meet anyone but the apostates! I humbly kneel, and may the radiance of the Throne bless your souls! I am Vir, wretched Vir!"

"Have mercy, {mf|master|mistress}! In these dire times you cannot expect to meet anyone but the apostates! I humbly kneel, and may the radiance of the Throne bless your souls! I am Vir, wretched Vir!"

"Have mercy, {mf|master|mistress}! In these dire times you cannot expect to meet anyone but the apostates! I humbly kneel, and may the radiance of the Throne bless your souls! I am Vir, wretched Vir!"

languages.text: “发发慈悲吧，{mf|主人|女主人}！在这黑暗的时代，我以为除了叛教者之外不会再遇到别人了呢！我谦卑地跪在你面前，愿黄金王座的光芒保佑你的灵魂！我是维尔，谦卑的维尔！”
languages.original_text: "Have mercy, {mf|master|mistress}! In these dire times you cannot expect to meet anyone but the apostates! I humbly kneel, and may the radiance of the Throne bless your souls! I am Vir, wretched Vir!"

traits.locale_text: “发发慈悲吧，{mf|主人|女主人}！在这黑暗的时代，我以为除了叛教者之外不会再遇到别人了呢！我谦卑地跪在你面前，愿黄金王座的光芒保佑你的灵魂！我是维尔，谦卑的维尔！”

languages.text: «¡Piedad, am{mf|o|a}! ¡En estos momentos terribles, uno no espera encontrar más que apóstatas! Me arrodillo humildemente ¡y ruego que la luz del Trono bendiga sus almas! Soy Vir, ¡Vir el desdichado!».
languages.original_text: "Have mercy, {mf|master|mistress}! In these dire times you cannot expect to meet anyone but the apostates! I humbly kneel, and may the radiance of the Throne bless your souls! I am Vir, wretched Vir!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Piedad, am{mf|o|a}! ¡En estos momentos terribles, uno no espera encontrar más que apóstatas! Me arrodillo humildemente ¡y ruego que la luz del Trono bendiga sus almas! Soy Vir, ¡Vir el desdichado!».

languages.text: 「どうか哀れみを、陛下！このような恐ろしい時代に、出会うのは背教者ばかり！謹んで跪き、王座の輝きがあなたの魂に祝福を届けるように祈ります！私はヴィル、哀れなヴィルです！」
languages.original_text: "Have mercy, {mf|master|mistress}! In these dire times you cannot expect to meet anyone but the apostates! I humbly kneel, and may the radiance of the Throne bless your souls! I am Vir, wretched Vir!"

traits.locale_text: 「どうか哀れみを、陛下！このような恐ろしい時代に、出会うのは背教者ばかり！謹んで跪き、王座の輝きがあなたの魂に祝福を届けるように祈ります！私はヴィル、哀れなヴィルです！」

languages.text: "Gnade, {mf|Herr|Herrin}! In diesen schweren Zeiten trifft man normalerweise ausschließlich auf Abtrünnige! Ich knie in Demut vor Euch, und möge die Strahlkraft des Throns Eure Seelen segnen! Ich bin Vir, der nichtswürdige Vir!"
languages.original_text: "Have mercy, {mf|master|mistress}! In these dire times you cannot expect to meet anyone but the apostates! I humbly kneel, and may the radiance of the Throne bless your souls! I am Vir, wretched Vir!"

traits.locale_text: "Gnade, {mf|Herr|Herrin}! In diesen schweren Zeiten trifft man normalerweise ausschließlich auf Abtrünnige! Ich knie in Demut vor Euch, und möge die Strahlkraft des Throns Eure Seelen segnen! Ich bin Vir, der nichtswürdige Vir!"

languages.text: « Pitié, Votre Seigneurie ! Par les temps qui courent, on ne s'attend pas à rencontrer qui que ce soit à part des apostats ! Je m'agenouille humblement devant vous, puisse la radiance du Trône vous bénir ! Moi, c'est Vir. À votre service ! »
languages.original_text: "Have mercy, {mf|master|mistress}! In these dire times you cannot expect to meet anyone but the apostates! I humbly kneel, and may the radiance of the Throne bless your souls! I am Vir, wretched Vir!"

traits.locale_text: « Pitié, Votre Seigneurie ! Par les temps qui courent, on ne s'attend pas à rencontrer qui que ce soit à part des apostats ! Je m'agenouille humblement devant vous, puisse la radiance du Trône vous bénir ! Moi, c'est Vir. À votre service ! »

languages.text: "Acıyın {mf|beyim|hanımım}! Bu vahim zamanlarda insan, sapkınlardan başka biriyle karşılaşacağını düşünemiyor! Alçakgönüllülükle önünüzde eğiliyorum. Taht'ın aydınlığı ruhlarınızı kutsasın! Ben Vir, sefil Vir!"
languages.original_text: "Have mercy, {mf|master|mistress}! In these dire times you cannot expect to meet anyone but the apostates! I humbly kneel, and may the radiance of the Throne bless your souls! I am Vir, wretched Vir!"

traits.locale_text: "Acıyın {mf|beyim|hanımım}! Bu vahim zamanlarda insan, sapkınlardan başka biriyle karşılaşacağını düşünemiyor! Alçakgönüllülükle önünüzde eğiliyorum, Taht'ın aydınlığı ruhlarınızı kutsasın! Ben Vir, sefil Vir!"
